definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: Linda, turn down the record player. I'm trying to read.
sentences.chinese: 琳達，把電唱機關小聲點，我想看書。

sentences.english: Replacing the needle of your record player can improve the sound quality drastically.
sentences.chinese: 更換電唱機上的唱針可以大大改善它的音質。

sentences.english: While the jukebox plays our favorite song.
sentences.chinese: 電唱機播放着催情的歌曲。

sentences.english: I bought an electric gramophone last year.
sentences.chinese: 我去年買了一臺電唱機。

sentences.english: Do they also sell toasters , blenderss and record players?
sentences.chinese: 他們也賣烤麪包機，果菜機和電唱機嗎？
